<t>CREATE TABLE users (id INT PRIMARY KEY, username STRING, email STRING, phone_number STRING, balance DECIMAL);

CREATE TABLE transactions (id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, amount DECIMAL, transaction_date TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE payments (id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT, payment_method STRING, status STRING, amount DECIMAL);</t><s>INSERT INTO users (id, username, email, phone_number, balance) SELECT 1, 'john_doe', 'john.doe@example.com', '123-456-7890', 100.00;</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE users (id INT PRIMARY KEY, username STRING, email STRING, phone_number STRING, balance DECIMAL);

CREATE TABLE transactions (id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, amount DECIMAL, transaction_date TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE payments (id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT, payment_method STRING, status STRING, amount DECIMAL);</t><s>insert into users (id, username, email, phone_number, balance) select 1, 'john_doe', 'john.doe@example.com', '123-456-7890', 100.00;</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE users (id INT PRIMARY KEY, username STRING, email STRING, phone_number STRING, balance DECIMAL);

CREATE TABLE payments (id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT, payment_method STRING, status STRING, amount DECIMAL);

CREATE TABLE transactions (id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, amount DECIMAL, transaction_date TIMESTAMP);</t><s>INSERT INTO users (id, username, email, phone_number, balance) SELECT 1, 'john_doe', 'john.doe@example.com', '123-456-7890', 100.00;</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE users (id INT PRIMARY KEY, username STRING, email STRING, phone_number STRING, balance DECIMAL);

CREATE TABLE payments (id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT, payment_method STRING, status STRING, amount DECIMAL);

CREATE TABLE users (id INT PRIMARY KEY, username STRING, email STRING, phone_number STRING, balance DECIMAL);

<t>CREATE TABLE transactions (id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, amount DECIMAL, transaction_date TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE payments (id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT, payment_method STRING, status STRING, amount DECIMAL);

CREATE TABLE users (id INT PRIMARY KEY, username STRING, email STRING, phone_number STRING, balance DECIMAL);</t><s>INSERT INTO users (id, username, email, phone_number, balance) SELECT 1, 'john_doe', 'john.doe@example.com', '123-456-7890', 100.00;</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE transactions (id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, amount DECIMAL, transaction_date TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE payments (id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT, payment_method STRING, status STRING, amount DECIMAL);

CREATE TABLE users (id INT PRIMARY KEY, username STRING, email STRING, phone_number STRING, balance DECIMAL);</t><s>insert into users (id, username, email, phone_number, balance) select 1, 'john_doe', 'john.doe@example.com', '123-456-7890', 100.00;</s>

CREATE TABLE payments (id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT, payment_method STRING, status STRING, amount DECIMAL);

CREATE TABLE transactions (id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, amount DECIMAL, transaction_date TIMESTAMP);</t><s>INSERT INTO transactions (id, user_id, amount, transaction_date) SELECT 2, 2, 75.00, '2022-09-02 10:30:00';</s>

<t>CREATE TABLE users (id INT PRIMARY KEY, username STRING, email STRING, phone_number STRING, balance DECIMAL);

CREATE TABLE transactions (id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, amount DECIMAL, transaction_date TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE payments (id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT, payment_method STRING, status STRING, amount DECIMAL);</t><s>INSERT INTO payments (id, transaction_id, payment_method, status, amount) SELECT 3, 3, 'Bank Transfer', 'Pending', 100.00;</s>

<t>CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    mobile_number VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE wallets (
    wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    balance DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    from_wallet_id INT REFERENCES wallets(wallet_id),
    to_wallet_id INT REFERENCES wallets(wallet_id),
    amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    transaction_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE payment_methods (
    method_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    method_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);</t><s>INSERT INTO users (user_id, username, mobile_number) SELECT 1, 'john_doe', '1234567890';</s>

    method_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    method_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    mobile_number VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL
);</t><s>INSERT INTO transactions (transaction_id, from_wallet_id, to_wallet_id, amount, transaction_date) SELECT 1, 1, 2, 50.00, '2022-10-01';</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE wallets (
    wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    balance DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    from_wallet_id INT REFERENCES wallets(wallet_id),
    to_wallet_id INT REFERENCES wallets(wallet_id),
    amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    transaction_date DATE
);

    transaction_date DATE
);

    wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    balance DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00
);

    to_wallet_id INT REFERENCES wallets(wallet_id),
    amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    transaction_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE wallets (
    wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    balance DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    mobile_number VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL
);

    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),

    to_wallet_id INT REFERENCES wallets(wallet_id),
    amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    transaction_date DATE
);

    mobile_number VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    from_wallet_id INT REFERENCES wallets(wallet_id),
    to_wallet_id INT REFERENCES wallets(wallet_id),
    amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    transaction_date DATE
);</t><s>insert into wallets (wallet_id, user_id, balance) select 2, 2, 200.00;</s>

CREATE TABLE payment_methods (
    method_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    method_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    from_wallet_id INT REFERENCES wallets(wallet_id),
    to_wallet_id INT REFERENCES wallets(wallet_id),
    amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    transaction_date DATE
);</t><s>insert into transactions (transaction_id, from_wallet_id, to_wallet_id, amount, transaction_date) select 2, 2, 1, 75.00, '2022-10-02';</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    mobile_number VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    from_wallet_id INT REFERENCES wallets(wallet_id),
    to_wallet_id INT REFERENCES wallets(wallet_id),
    amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    transaction_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE wallets (
    wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    balance DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00
);

    method_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),

);

    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    from_wallet_id INT REFERENCES wallets(wallet_id),
    to_wallet_id INT REFERENCES wallets(wallet_id),
    amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    transaction_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    mobile_number VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL
);</t><s>insert into users (user_id, username, mobile_number) select 3, 'alice_blue', '4567890123';</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    from_wallet_id INT REFERENCES wallets(wallet_id),
    to_wallet_id INT REFERENCES wallets(wallet_id),
    amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    transaction_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    mobile_number VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE wallets (
    wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    balance DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00
);

CREATE TABLE payment_methods (
    method_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    method_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL

    to_wallet_id INT REFERENCES wallets(wallet_id),
    amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    transaction_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE wallets (
    wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    balance DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00
);

    method_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    method_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL

    to_wallet_id INT REFERENCES wallets(wallet_id),
    amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    transaction_date DATE
);

    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    mobile_number VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL
);

    method_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    from_wallet_id INT REFERENCES wallets(wallet_id),
    to_wallet_id INT REFERENCES wallets(wallet_id),
    amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    transaction_date DATE
);

    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    mobile_number VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL
);

    wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    balance DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00

    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    mobile_number VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE wallets (
    wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    balance DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    from_wallet_id INT REFERENCES wallets(wallet_id),
    to_wallet_id INT REFERENCES wallets(wallet_id),
    amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    transaction_date DATE
);</t><s>insert into users (user_id, username, mobile_number) select 4, 'bob_green', '7654321098';</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE payment_methods (
    method_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    method_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    mobile_number VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    from_wallet_id INT REFERENCES wallets(wallet_id),
    to_wallet_id INT REFERENCES wallets(wallet_id),
    amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    transaction_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    from_wallet_id INT REFERENCES wallets(wallet_id),
    to_wallet_id INT REFERENCES wallets(wallet_id),
    amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    transaction_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE payment_methods (
    method_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    method_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    mobile_number VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL
);</t><s>insert into wallets (wallet_id, user_id, balance) select 4, 4, 300.00;</s>

    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),

);

<t>CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,

    wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY,

);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    from_wallet_id INT REFERENCES wallets(wallet_id),
    to_wallet_id INT REFERENCES wallets(wallet_id),
    amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    transaction_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE payment_methods (
    method_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    method_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);</t><s>insert into transactions (transaction_id, from_wallet_id, to_wallet_id, amount, transaction_date) select 4, 4, 1, 100.00, '2022-10-04';</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    mobile_number VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE wallets (
    wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    balance DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00
);

CREATE TABLE payment_methods (
    method_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    method_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

);

CREATE TABLE payment_methods (
    method_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    method_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    from_wallet_id INT REFERENCES wallets(wallet_id),
    to_wallet_id INT REFERENCES wallets(wallet_id),
    amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    transaction_date DATE
);</t><s>insert into wallets (wallet_id, user_id, balance) select 5, 5, 250.00;</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    mobile_number VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    from_wallet_id INT REFERENCES wallets(wallet_id),
    to_wallet_id INT REFERENCES wallets(wallet_id),
    amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    transaction_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE wallets (
    wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    balance DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00
);

    method_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    method_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL

    to_wallet_id INT REFERENCES wallets(wallet_id),
    amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    transaction_date DATE
);

<t>CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());

CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));</t><s>INSERT INTO Users (user_id, username, email, phone_number, created_at) SELECT 1, 'john_doe', 'john.doe@example.com', '1234567890', NOW()</s>

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));</t><s>insert into users (user_id, username, email, phone_number, created_at) select 1, 'john_doe', 'john.doe@example.com', '1234567890', now()</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());

CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

<t>CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));</t><s>INSERT INTO Users (user_id, username, email, phone_number, created_at) SELECT 1, 'john_doe', 'john.doe@example.com', '1234567890', NOW()</s>

<t>CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));</t><s>INSERT INTO Users (user_id, username, email, phone_number, created_at) SELECT 1, 'john_doe', 'john.doe@example.com', '1234567890', NOW()</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));</t><s>insert into users (user_id, username, email, phone_number, created_at) select 1, 'john_doe', 'john.doe@example.com', '1234567890', now()</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));</t><s>INSERT INTO Users (user_id, username, email, phone_number, created_at) SELECT 1, 'john_doe', 'john.doe@example.com', '1234567890', NOW()</s>

CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());</t><s>insert into users (user_id, username, email, phone_number, created_at) select 1, 'john_doe', 'john.doe@example.com', '1234567890', now()</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());

<t>CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

<t>CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());

CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));</t><s>INSERT INTO Users (user_id, username, email, phone_number, created_at) SELECT 1, 'john_doe', 'john.doe@example.com', '1234567890', NOW()</s>

CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));</t><s>insert into users (user_id, username, email, phone_number, created_at) select 1, 'john_doe', 'john.doe@example.com', '1234567890', now()</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

<t>CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());

CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());</t><s>insert into users (user_id, username, email, phone_number, created_at) select 1, 'john_doe', 'john.doe@example.com', '1234567890', now()</s>

<t>CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());

CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));</t><s>insert into wallets (wallet_id, user_id, balance, created_at) select 1, 1, 1000.00, now()</s>

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));</t><s>insert into wallets (wallet_id, user_id, balance, created_at) select 1, 1, 1000.00, now()</s>

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));</t><s>insert into wallets (wallet_id, user_id, balance, created_at) select 1, 1, 1000.00, now()</s>

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));</t><s>insert into wallets (wallet_id, user_id, balance, created_at) select 1, 1, 1000.00, now()</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());</t><s>insert into wallets (wallet_id, user_id, balance, created_at) select 1, 1, 1000.00, now()</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());

CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());</t><s>insert into wallets (wallet_id, user_id, balance, created_at) select 1, 1, 1000.00, now()</s>

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));</t><s>insert into wallets (wallet_id, user_id, balance, created_at) select 1, 1, 1000.00, now()</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));</t><s>INSERT INTO Wallets (wallet_id, user_id, balance, created_at) SELECT 1, 1, 1000.00, NOW()</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());

CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));</t><s>insert into wallets (wallet_id, user_id, balance, created_at) select 1, 1, 1000.00, now()</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());</t><s>insert into wallets (wallet_id, user_id, balance, created_at) select 1, 1, 1000.00, now()</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));</t><s>INSERT INTO Wallets (wallet_id, user_id, balance, created_at) SELECT 1, 1, 1000.00, NOW()</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());

CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));</t><s>insert into wallets (wallet_id, user_id, balance, created_at) select 1, 1, 1000.00, now()</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());</t><s>insert into wallets (wallet_id, user_id, balance, created_at) select 1, 1, 1000.00, now()</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());</t><s>insert into wallets (wallet_id, user_id, balance, created_at) select 1, 1, 1000.00, now()</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

<t>CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));</t><s>INSERT INTO Transactions (transaction_id, sender_wallet_id, receiver_wallet_id, amount, transaction_date) SELECT 1, 1, 2, 500.00, '2022-01-01'</s>

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));</t><s>insert into transactions (transaction_id, sender_wallet_id, receiver_wallet_id, amount, transaction_date) select 1, 1, 2, 500.00, '2022-01-01'</s>

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());</t><s>insert into transactions (transaction_id, sender_wallet_id, receiver_wallet_id, amount, transaction_date) select 1, 1, 2, 500.00, '2022-01-01'</s>

<t>CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));</t><s>INSERT INTO Transactions (transaction_id, sender_wallet_id, receiver_wallet_id, amount, transaction_date) SELECT 1, 1, 2, 500.00, '2022-01-01'</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

<t>CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

<t>CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());

CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));</t><s>insert into payments (payment_id, transaction_id, status, payment_date) select 1, 1, 'completed', '2022-01-01'</s>

<t>CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));</t><s>insert into payments (payment_id, transaction_id, status, payment_date) select 1, 1, 'completed', '2022-01-01'</s>

CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

<t>CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());

<t>CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));</t><s>INSERT INTO Payments (payment_id, transaction_id, status, payment_date) SELECT 1, 1, 'completed', '2022-01-01'</s>

CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));</t><s>INSERT INTO Payments (payment_id, transaction_id, status, payment_date) SELECT 1, 1, 'completed', '2022-01-01'</s>

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));</t><s>insert into payments (payment_id, transaction_id, status, payment_date) select 1, 1, 'completed', '2022-01-01'</s>

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));</t><s>INSERT INTO Cards (card_id, user_id, card_number, expiry_date, cvv, card_type) SELECT 1, 1, '1111222233334444', '2024-12-01', '123', 'visa'</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());

CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));</t><s>insert into cards (card_id, user_id, card_number, expiry_date, cvv, card_type) select 1, 1, '1111222233334444', '2024-12-01', '123', 'visa'</s>

CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));</t><s>INSERT INTO Cards (card_id, user_id, card_number, expiry_date, cvv, card_type) SELECT 1, 1, '1111222233334444', '2024-12-01', '123', 'visa'</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());

CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));</t><s>INSERT INTO Cards (card_id, user_id, card_number, expiry_date, cvv, card_type) SELECT 1, 1, '1111222233334444', '2024-12-01', '123', 'visa'</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());

<t>CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());

CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());</t><s>INSERT INTO Cards (card_id, user_id, card_number, expiry_date, cvv, card_type) SELECT 1, 1, '1111222233334444', '2024-12-01', '123', 'visa'</s>

<t>CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());

CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());

CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));</t><s>INSERT INTO Cards (card_id, user_id, card_number, expiry_date, cvv, card_type) SELECT 1, 1, '1111222233334444', '2024-12-01', '123', 'visa'</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());

CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));</t><s>insert into cards (card_id, user_id, card_number, expiry_date, cvv, card_type) select 1, 1, '1111222233334444', '2024-12-01', '123', 'visa'</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));
